overview:
Peter Bauert is internationally renowned as the man who increased Fast Search & Transfer (FAST)’s revenue from $30M to $200M. He is a revolutionary figure who is able to build businesses and make them grow.

Peter Bauert currently holds the COO and CFO Senior Executive positives at Parallels, another leader in the technological field. More information about him and the company are available at http://www.parallels.com/about/leadership/
